thread.title: OpenAI Launches Project Feature For All ChatGPT Free Users
thread.title_full: OpenAI Launches Project Feature For All ChatGPT Free Users

author: @voidotid
title: OpenAI Launches Project Feature For All ChatGPT Free Users
text:
JAKARTA - OpenAI officially launched the Project feature on ChatGPT, for users for free. Previously, this feature could only be accessed by paid users. But now, all users can try it.
The project on ChatGPT is now available to free users, wrote the company led by Sam Altman in its announcement on X.
Projects in ChatGPT are now available to Free users.
In addition, we’ve added:- Larger file uploads per project (up to 5 for Free, 25 for Plus, 40 for Pro/Business/Enterprise)- Option to select colors and icons for more customization- Project-only memory controls for more… pic.twitter.com/GGygJuBify
— OpenAI (@OpenAI) September 3, 2025
Projects in ChatGPT are now available to Free users.
In addition, we've added:- Large uploads file per project (up to 5 for Free, 25 for Plus, 40 for Pro/Business/Enterprise)- Option to select colors and icons for more customization- Project-only memory controls for more ... pic.twitter.com/GGygJuBify
In addition, along with the expansion of this access, OpenAI also added a number of updates, including:
This Projects feature can be used in web versions and Android applications, while iOS users will be rolled out gradually in the next few days.
Launched in December last year, Project is a smart workspace that brings together all things related to long-term work in one place.
Through this feature, you can group conversations, upload reference files, and add special instructions so that ChatGPT remembers important things and remains focused on topics.
"With memory, context, and flexible tools, projects are ideal for recurring and developing work such as writing, research, planning, and more," the company wrote.
The English, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, and French versions are automatically generated by the AI. So there may still be inaccuracies in translating, please always see Indonesian as our main language. (system supported by DigitalSiber.id)
